name: Code.me
tag_list: web-design, consulting, strategy, web-services, internet-marketing, optimization, motion-design
overview:
Code.me is an interactive agency with a strategic, business-first approach. Founded in 2009, Code.Me is an independent global interactive agency. They also offer best-in-class Mobile solutions (iPhone, iPad, Android), Connected Architecture Design, SEO, SEM, Social Media and Web analytics tools and strategies. With detailed strategic analysis, client-side experience, and a high skills level in design, development and optimization. Code.Me combines the disciplines of strategy, design, marketing and technology to effectively communicate their clientâ€™s brand and achieve their business objectives.

Code.me believe in creating visually engaging and intuitive interactive experiences that are user-friendly. They also offer best-in-class SEO, SEM and Web analytics tools and strategies. Code.me enjoys close partnerships with client marketing and management teams and successfully collaborates with them to build financial and business models to drive growth and maximize ROI. Code.me keeps them close to their process through each stage of a project from launch to completion.The company takes pride in creating multi-channel solutions that bridge the gap between creativity and strategy amid a dynamic and constantly evolving marketplace. Code.meâ€™s team includes senior-level talent in online/offline interactions, online marketing, design, web development, architecture information, web analytics and optimization. They are an academically, culturally and professionally diverse group which enables them to see the big picture, think outside the box, and serve their clients the best possible way.
